comment: Germany - A horde of illegal asylum seekers have gone on a rampage at an Edeka supermarket in berlingen (Lake Constance), leaving it completely devastated. There is no police report on this event, nor can you find anything in the German media about it. The media works hand in glove with the Merkel government to keep the public from knowing how bad things are.
